translations: n.鱼雷，水雷；信号雷管；掼炮；油井爆破筒；电鳐
v.用鱼雷袭击；彻底破坏，完全摧毁

sentences.sentence: The torpedo struck home on the hull of the ship.
But the legacy he leaves behind is so rich, so deep, that no scandal can torpedo it.
sentences.translation: 但是，他留给我们的回忆既丰富又深刻，任何丑闻都不能将之摧毁。

sentences.sentence: Torpedo rays (Torpedo californica) are identifiable by their flat gray bodies and black spots.
sentences.translation: 电鯆（电鳐）可以通过他们扁平的灰色身体和黑色斑点被认出来。
